author: andreas
msg: Fixed context prefix handling and uuid2url transformer configuration in sitetree module

author: gshimansky
msg: [drlvm][classloader] Fixed bug prone code in Class_File_Loader file

author: gshimansky
msg: [drlvm][jvmti] GetOwnedMonitorInfo returns information about 1 monitor even if there are no monitors owned by the specified thread
It is necessary to set TI_GC_ENABLE_MONITOR_EVENTS when can_get_owned_monitor_info is requested because
otherwise TM doesn't use slow path all the time and so JVMTI doesn't know about some entered monitors.

author: gsim
msg: Various minor fixes to build and test process:
* cpp/src/tests/start_broker - removed use of the now invalid --ppid option
* cpp/src/tests/Makefile.am - make running of ais tests dependent on inclusion of cluster
* cpp/src/Makefile.am - added missing PrivatePosix.h file to dist
* cpp/Makefile.am - added examples to list of sub dirs

author: gshimansky
msg: Added tracing for method enter/exit to improve debugging
